name: Hyperball
overview: A sequel\improvement of Wooden Ball. There are 3 game areas and to score you must hit the ball into the goal in the score area. If the ball hits your opponents wall you can stop the ball by pressing fire. If your GameCar touches your opponents goal you will be teleported to your side. By taking the ControlSign you will also control the ball, but if your opponent hits you, you lose control. If you choose Control Goal from the menu, you control your opponents goal in the score area. You set the difference in goals to allow a win. Released as part of the Nordlicht Spiele-Pack 4.
